title: Apsara Pushpa Jhumka: Floral Fantasy Earrings
materials: Base metal with intricate floral designs. Adorned with Pink and clear Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Featuring sapphire hued gemstones and two fresh water pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A cascading floral design reminiscent of lush gardens, these earrings feature expertly arranged cubic zirconia stones that capture the light beautifully. The design is a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian motifs. The flowers are encrusted with pink gems, while sapphire-colored stones and natural pearls add an elegant touch.

occasions: or any special occasion. Adds a touch of glamour to both traditional and modern attire.
description: These Apsara Pushpa Jhumkas are a stunning fusion of contemporary design and timeless elegance. Crafted with precision and featuring high-quality CZ stones, they exude luxury and sophistication. Their floral motifs make them a versatile addition to any jewelry collection, adding a touch of elegance.
